sentences.en: A thin layer of gold or something simulating gold that is applied in gilding.
sentences.cn: 镀金，包金一层薄的涂金层或其适用于镀金的仿金物。

sentences.en: Don't put any more decorations on the Christmas cake, that would be gilding the lily.
sentences.cn: 别再给娃诞蛋糕加装饰品了, 那会画蛇添足的.

sentences.en: Edge decoration: Coloured dyes, marbling transfers or gilding on trimmed book edges.
sentences.cn: 书边装饰: 裁切后的书边,可用颜色染料 、 云石纹印染或烫金装饰.

sentences.en: Gilding the lily leads to insanity.
sentences.cn: 镀金百合将导致精神病.

sentences.en: His article praising classical Greek art is just gilding lily.
sentences.cn: 他的那篇高度评价古典希腊艺术的论文真是锦上添花.

sentences.en: I want a girdle with gilding.
sentences.cn: 我想要一件镀金的腰带.

sentences.en: If the pills were pleasant , they would not want gilding.
sentences.cn: 药丸如不苦,何必加糖衣.

sentences.en: Improvement of gilded registration means gilding scrap rate cuts.
sentences.cn: 烫金套准装置的改进意味着烫金废品率进一步降低.

sentences.en: It is suitable for gilding and impressing of stripped and coiled leather, cloth and rubber products.
sentences.cn: 适用于皮革 、 布条、橡胶等带状卷状物品的烫印及压痕.

sentences.en: It is widely used for surface transfer printing and gilding of stripped articles and reeled products.
sentences.cn: 是用途广泛的带状卷状物体表面的转印及烫金.

sentences.en: The dress is perfect. Don't add anything to it at all. It would just be gilding the lily.
sentences.cn: 这条裙子已经很完美了, 别再作任何修饰了, 那只会画蛇添足.

sentences.en: The selection of blocking device is determined by the quality of gilding.
sentences.cn: 烫金设备的选型是决定烫金质量的关键因素.

sentences.en: The sixth step is to polish and the last step is gilding.
sentences.cn: 第六步是抛光,最后一步是镀金.

sentences.en: What do you think of the gold gilding decorations on scabbard?
sentences.cn: 鞘上的错金文饰可有个说法 吗 ?

sentences.en: Your house has lovely brickwork . Don't paint it . That would be gilding the lily.
sentences.cn: 你的房子砌得非常好看,不用漆了,再漆实在是多此一举.

words.tran_cn: 镀金；小母猪；眩目的外表
镀金（gild的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: Gilding is a layer of gold or gold paint that is put on something

trans.tran_cn: 把…镀金( gild的现在分词 )，给…上金色，作多余的修饰（反而破坏原已完美的东西），画蛇添足
